languages.text: Псайкеры связаны с варпом и способны использовать его энергию в реальном мире — их особенные {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} называются психосилами. Их действия разрушительны и опасны не только для врагов, но и для самих псайкеров (а также их союзников). Каждое использование психосил с вероятностью (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинг{/g})% может вызвать {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g}, а также истончает {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}завесу{/g} между реальным миром и варпом, увеличивая значение на шкале истончения завесы. Психосилы могут быть малыми и значительными. Малые психосилы увеличивают истончение завесы на 1 за каждое использование, в то время как значимые повышают это значение на 3 за каждое использование, а также могут вызвать пси-морок в четыре раза чаще. Пси-морок не опасен сам по себе, но он может уменьшить значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}. Когда истончение завесы достигает 15, дальнейшее использование значимых психосил приведет к появлению {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g}.
languages.original_text: Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in the realspace — their special abilities are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of psychic powers has a (5+Psy Rating)% chance to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}Psychic Phenomena{/g}, and also thins the veil between the realspace and the warp, increasing the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Veil Degradation{/g} rank. Psychic powers can be minor or major. Minor psychic powers increase Veil Degradation by 1 per use, while major Veil Degradation increase it by 3 per use and cause Psychic Phenomena four times as often. Psychic Phenomena are not dangerous by themselves, but are disconcerting and slightly reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Momentum{/g} of the party. But, when Veil Degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will cause {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Perils of the Warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Псайкеры связаны с варпом и способны использовать его энергию в реальном мире — их особенные способности называются психосилами. Их действия разрушительны и опасны не только для врагов, но и для самих псайкеров (а также их союзников). Каждое использование психосил с вероятностью (5 + пси-рейтинг)% может вызвать {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g}, а также истончает завесу между реальным миром и варпом, увеличивая значение на шкале {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истощения завесы{/g}. Психосилы могут быть малыми и значительными. Малые психосилы увеличивают истощение завесы на 1 за каждое использование, в то время как значительные повышают это значение на 3 за каждое использование, а также могут вызвать пси-морок в четыре раза чаще. Пси-морок не опасен сам по себе, но он может уменьшить значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} и снизить скорость всего отряда. Когда истощение завесы достигает 15, дальнейшее использование психосил приведет к появлению {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g}.

Псайкеры связаны с варпом и способны использовать его энергию в реальном мире — их особенные способности называются психосилами. Их действия разрушительны и опасны не только для врагов, но и для самих псайкеров (а также их союзников). Каждое использование психосил с вероятностью (5 + пси-рейтинг)% может вызвать {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}пси-морок{/g}, а также истончает завесу между реальным миром и варпом, увеличивая значение на шкале {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истощения завесы{/g}. Психосилы могут быть малыми и значительными. Малые психосилы увеличивают истощение завесы на 1 за каждое использование, в то время как значительные повышают это значение на 3 за каждое использование, а также могут вызвать пси-морок в четыре раза чаще. Пси-морок не опасен сам по себе, но он может уменьшить значение {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}моментума{/g} и снизить скорость всего отряда. Когда истощение завесы достигает 15, дальнейшее использование психосил приведет к появлению {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}угроз варпа{/g}.

languages.text: Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between realspace and the warp, increasing veil degradation. Psychic powers can be minor or major. Minor psychic powers increase veil degradation by 1 per use, while major psychic powers increase it by 3 per use and cause psychic phenomena four times as often. Psychic phenomena are not dangerous by themselves, but are disconcerting and slightly reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

Психосилы могут быть малыми и значительными. traits.locale_text: Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special abilities are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + psy rating)% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the veil between realspace and the warp, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. Psychic powers can be minor or major. Minor psychic powers increase veil degradation by 1 per use, while major psychic powers increase it by 3 per use and cause psychic phenomena four times as often. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between realspace and the warp, increasing veil degradation. Psychic powers can be minor or major. Minor psychic powers increase veil degradation by 1 per use, while major psychic powers increase it by 3 per use and cause psychic phenomena four times as often. Psychic phenomena are not dangerous by themselves, but are disconcerting and slightly reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between realspace and the warp, increasing veil degradation. Psychic powers can be minor or major. Minor psychic powers increase veil degradation by 1 per use, while major psychic powers increase it by 3 per use and cause psychic phenomena four times as often. Psychic phenomena are not dangerous by themselves, but are disconcerting and slightly reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

languages.text: Psioniker sind mit dem Warp verbunden und können sich dessen Energie im Realraum zunutze machen. Ihre besonderen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} werden psionische Kräfte genannt. Ihre Aktionen sind zerstörerisch und gefährlich, nicht nur für Feinde, sondern auch für die Psioniker selbst (und ihre Verbündeten). Jeder Einsatz einer psionischen Kraft hat eine Chance von (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g}) %, {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionische Phänomene{/g} zu verursachen. Außerdem schwächt jeder Einsatz den {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Schleier{/g} zwischen dem Realraum und dem Warp, was den Zerfall des Schleiers erhöht. Psionische Kräfte können geringfügig oder erheblich sein. Geringfügige psionische Kräfte erhöhen den Zerfall des Schleiers um 1 pro Anwendung, während erhebliche psionische Kräfte die Schwächung um 3 pro Anwendung erhöhen und viermal so oft psionische Phänomene verursachen. Psionische Phänomene sind nicht gefährlich, aber beunruhigend und verringern die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} der Gruppe leicht. Erreicht der Zerfall des Schleiers aber 15, führt die fortgesetzte Nutzung psionischer Kräfte zu den {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text: Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between realspace and the warp, increasing veil degradation. Psychic powers can be minor or major. Minor psychic powers increase veil degradation by 1 per use, while major psychic powers increase it by 3 per use and cause psychic phenomena four times as often. Psychic phenomena are not dangerous by themselves, but are disconcerting and slightly reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Psioniker sind mit dem Warp verbunden und können sich dessen Energie im Realraum zunutze machen — ihre besonderen {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} werden {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}psionische Kräfte{/g} genannt. Ihre Aktionen sind zerstörerisch und gefährlich, nicht nur für Feinde, sondern auch für die Psioniker selbst (und ihre Verbündeten). Jeder Einsatz einer psionischen Kraft hat eine Chance von (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g}) %, {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psionische Phänomene{/g} zu verursachen. Außerdem verdünnt jeder Einsatz den Schleier zwischen dem Realraum und dem Warp, was den {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Zerfall des Schleiers{/g} erhöht. Psionische Kräfte können geringfügig oder erheblich sein. Geringfügige psionische Kräfte erhöhen den Zerfall des Schleiers um 1 pro Anwendung, während erhebliche psionische Kräfte die Verschlechterung um 3 pro Anwendung erhöhen und viermal so oft psionische Phänomene verursachen. Psionische Phänomene sind an sich nicht gefährlich, aber sie sind beunruhigend und verringern die {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} der Gruppe leicht. Wenn der Zerfall des Schleiers aber 15 erreicht, führt die fortgesetzte Nutzung von psionischen Kräften zu den {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}Gefahren des Warp{/g}.

languages.text: Les psykers sont reliés au Warp dont ils peuvent exploiter l'énergie dans l'espace réel. Leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} spéciales sont appelées « pouvoirs psychiques ». Leurs redoutables actions sont aussi destructrices pour les ennemis que pour les psykers eux-mêmes (ainsi que pour leurs alliés). Chaque utilisation d'un pouvoir psychique a (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g}) % de chances de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g}, et amincit le voile qui sépare l'espace réel du Warp, accentuant ainsi la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du voile{/g}. Il existe deux types de pouvoirs psychiques : mineurs et majeurs. Les pouvoirs psychiques mineurs accentuent la Dégradation du voile de 1 point par utilisation, tandis que les pouvoirs psychiques majeurs l'accroissent de 3 points par utilisation et déclenchent des phénomènes psychiques quatre fois plus souvent. Les phénomènes psychiques ne sont pas dangereux en eux-mêmes, mais restent déroutants et réduisent légèrement la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} du groupe. Lorsque la Dégradation du voile atteint une valeur de 15, la poursuite de l'utilisation des pouvoirs psychiques déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.
languages.original_text: Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between realspace and the warp, increasing veil degradation. Psychic powers can be minor or major. Minor psychic powers increase veil degradation by 1 per use, while major psychic powers increase it by 3 per use and cause psychic phenomena four times as often. Psychic phenomena are not dangerous by themselves, but are disconcerting and slightly reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les psykers sont connectés au Warp dont ils peuvent exploiter l'énergie dans l'espace réel. Leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} spéciales s'appellent des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g}. Leurs redoutables actions sont aussi destructrices pour les ennemis que pour les psykers eux-mêmes (ainsi que pour leurs alliés). Chaque utilisation d'un pouvoir psychique a (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g}) % de chances de déclencher des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}phénomènes psychiques{/g}, et amincit le voile qui sépare l'espace réel du Warp, accentuant ainsi la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}dégradation du voile{/g}. Il existe deux types de pouvoirs psychiques : mineurs et majeurs. Les pouvoirs psychiques mineurs accentuent la dégradation du voile de 1 point par utilisation, tandis que les pouvoirs psychiques majeurs l'accroissent de 3 points par utilisation et déclenchent des phénomènes psychiques quatre fois plus souvent. Les phénomènes psychiques ne sont pas dangereux en soi, mais ils sont déroutants et réduisent légèrement la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} du groupe. Lorsque la dégradation du voile atteint une valeur de 15, la poursuite de l'utilisation des pouvoirs psychiques déclenche des {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}périls du Warp{/g}.

languages.text: 灵能者与亚空间紧密相连，可以在真实世界使用中使用亚空间的力量。他们这种特殊的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，被称为灵能能力。他们的能力不仅可以对敌人造成巨大破坏，对他们自己（以及他们的盟友）也同样危险。每当灵能者使用灵能能力时，都会有（5+{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}）%的几率触发{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}灵能异象{/g}，还会使真实世界与亚空间之间的{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁{/g}变薄，加剧障壁恶化程度。灵能能力可分为主要能力与次要能力。使用次要能力会使障壁恶化程度提高1点。使用主要能力会使障壁恶化程度提高3点，触发灵能异象的概率为次要能力的四倍。灵能异象本身并不危险，但会令队伍成员感到不安，略微降低队伍的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。然而，当障壁恶化程度到达15之后，继续使用灵能能力可能会触发{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}亚空间的威胁{/g}。
languages.original_text: Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between realspace and the warp, increasing veil degradation. Psychic powers can be minor or major. Minor psychic powers increase veil degradation by 1 per use, while major psychic powers increase it by 3 per use and cause psychic phenomena four times as often. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

languages.original_text: Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special abilities are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + psy rating)% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the veil between realspace and the warp, increasing {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g}. Psychic phenomena are not dangerous by themselves, but are disconcerting and slightly reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} of the party. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

languages.text: Los psíquicos están vinculados a la disformidad y pueden canalizar su energía en el espacio real. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} únicas se denominan poderes psíquicos. Sus acciones son destructivas y peligrosas no solo para sus enemigos, sino también para el propio psíquico y sus aliados. Cada uso de un poder psíquico tiene una probabilidad del (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g}) % de causar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} y además debilita el {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}velo{/g} que separa el espacio real y la disformidad, lo que aumenta la degradación del velo. Los poderes psíquicos pueden ser menores o mayores. Los poderes psíquicos menores aumentan la degradación del velo en 1 al usarlos, mientras que los mayores lo aumentan en 3 y pueden provocar fenómenos psíquicos con el cuádruple de probabilidad. Los fenómenos psíquicos no son particularmente peligrosos, pero sí desconcertantes, lo que reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} del grupo. Pero, cuando la degradación del velo llega a 15, el uso de los poderes psíquicos da lugar a las {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.
languages.original_text: Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between realspace and the warp, increasing veil degradation. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los psíquicos están vinculados a la disformidad y pueden canalizar su energía en el espacio real. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} únicas se denominan {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g}. Sus acciones son destructivas y peligrosas no solo para sus enemigos, sino también para el propio psíquico y sus aliados. Cada uso de un poder psíquico tiene una probabilidad del (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g}) % de causar {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}fenómenos psíquicos{/g} y además debilita el velo que separa el espacio real y la disformidad, lo que aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g}. Los poderes psíquicos pueden ser menores o mayores. Los poderes psíquicos menores aumentan la degradación del velo en 1 al usarlos, mientras que los mayores lo aumentan en 3 y pueden provocar fenómenos psíquicos con el cuádruple de probabilidad. Los fenómenos psíquicos no son particularmente peligrosos, pero sí desconcertantes, lo que reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} del grupo. Pero, cuando la degradación del velo llega a 15, el uso de los poderes psíquicos da lugar a las {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}fatalidades de la disformidad{/g}.

languages.text: 異能者は<歪み>に繋がっており、そのエネルギーをリアルスペースで使用することができる。彼らの特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は超能力と呼ばれている。彼らのアクションは敵だけにとどまらず異能者自身（そして味方）にとっても破壊力があり危険である。超能力を使用すると、1回あたりの{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}を発現させる確率は(5+{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g})%であり、リアルスペースと<歪み>の間のヴェールを弱め、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェール{/g}の劣化を推進する。超能力には弱と強がある。弱の超能力を1回使用するごとにヴェールの劣化が1進み、強の超能力は使用するごとに劣化を3進め、心霊現象を4倍の頻度で発現させる。心霊現象そのものは危険ではないが混乱をきたすものであり、部隊の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を少し弱める。しかし、ヴェールの劣化が15に達すると、超能力の継続使用で{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}が発現する。
languages.original_text: Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between realspace and the warp, increasing veil degradation. Psychic powers can be minor or major. Minor psychic powers increase veil degradation by 1 per use, while major psychic powers increase it by 3 per use and cause psychic phenomena four times as often. Psychic phenomena are not dangerous by themselves, but are disconcerting and slightly reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 異能者は<歪み>に繋がっておりそのエネルギーをリアルスペースで使用することができる。彼らの特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}と呼ばれている。彼らのアクションは敵だけにとどまらず異能者自身（そして味方）にとっても破壊力があり危険である。超能力を使用すると、1回あたりの{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}心霊現象{/g}を発現させる確率は(5+{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g})％であり、リアルスペースと<歪み>の間のヴェールを弱め、{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}を推進する。超能力には弱と強がある。弱の超能力を1回使用するごとにヴェールの劣化が1進み、強の超能力は使用するごとに劣化を3進め、心霊現象を4倍の頻度で発現させる。心霊現象そのものは危険ではないが混乱をきたすものであり、部隊の{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を少し弱める。しかし、ヴェールの劣化が15に達すると、超能力の継続使用で{g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}危険な<歪み>{/g}が発現する。

languages.text: Ruhsezerlerin öteboyutla bağları bulunur ve enerjisinden gerçekuzayda faydalanabilirler. Bu özel {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerine{/g} ruhsezi güçleri adı verilir. Ruhsezerlerin bu eylemleri sadece düşmanları için değil kendileri (ve dost birimleri) için de yıkıcı ve tehlikelidir. Ruhsezi güçlerinin her kullanımının %(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g}) oranında {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}ruhsezi fenomeni{/g} tetikleme olasılığı bulunur. Ayrıca gerçekuzay ile öteboyut arasındaki {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}örtüyü{/g} incelterek örtü bozulmasını artırır. Ruhsezi güçleri küçük veya büyük olabilir. Küçük ruhsezi güçleri, örtü bozulmasını her kullanımla 1 artırırken büyük ruhsezi güçleri ise 3 yükseltir ve ruhsezi fenomenlerine dört kat daha sık sebep olur. Ruhsezi fenomeni tek başına tehlike arz etmese de rahatsız edicidir ve grubun {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentumunu{/g} az miktarda düşürür. Ancak örtü bozulması 15'e ulaştığında ruhsezi güçlerinin kullanımına devam edilmesi, {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}öteboyut tehlikelerine{/g} yol açar.
languages.original_text: Psykers are connected to the warp and are able to harness its energy in realspace — their special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} are called psychic powers. Their actions are destructive and dangerous not only for enemies, but also for the psykers themselves (as well as their allies). Each use of a psychic power has a chance of (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g})% to cause {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPhenomena}psychic phenomena{/g}, and also thins the {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} between realspace and the warp, increasing veil degradation. Psychic powers can be minor or major. Minor psychic powers increase veil degradation by 1 per use, while major psychic powers increase it by 3 per use and cause psychic phenomena four times as often. Psychic phenomena are not dangerous by themselves, but are disconcerting and slightly reduce the {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} of the party. But, when veil degradation reaches 15, continued use of psychic powers will lead to {g|Encyclopedia:PerilsOfWarp}perils of the warp{/g}.
